page.title: 07EDUCATION KIRKBY MALZEARD
page.content: {Pre-school children}in Grewelthorpe & Kirkby Malzeard attend{playschools}on a voluntary basis but out of this area {GREWELTHORPE PRIMARY SCHOOL (C of E) 30-40 children aged 5-11 in 2 classes Headmistress + 1 teacher + 1 part time {KIRKBY MALZEARD PRIMARY SCHOOL(C of E) Approx 60 children aged 5-11,3 classes Headmaster + 2 teachers + 1 part time. At 11yrs children move on to{secondary {schools}in RIPON (mainly) & HARROGATE There is a selection procedure to choose the brightest for{RIPON GRAMMAR {SCHOOL.}Children can leave school at 16yrs.Further education facilities are all outside this area but some young people do travel from home to{colleges in nearby towns although transport is a serious problem.(No buses) The{closure of village schools}when numbers fall causes much local sadness we hope our schools are still safe.
